pages.text: You may have noticed that wooden tools are gone, and while you can still break trees with your hand that is for sure not the best course of action. $(br2)But fright not, you can now make improvised tools with pebbles and sticks! $(br2)Can't find any pebbles around? Try to break $(2)Grass/Dirt $(0)blocks until you drop some.
Then get some sticks from twigs (or breaking leaves if that's more your thing.) and make you first pebble tool, the Pebble Shiv.
Use your newly acquired Pebble Shiv to cut some grass and catch some straw, straw will be used in all following pebble tools recipes.
After you get a hatchet you are set, craft the other tools or just get a pick and upgrade straight to stone.
